const response = await client.search({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  query: {
    nested: {
      path: "obj1",
      query: {
        bool: {
          must: [
            {
              match: {
                "obj1.name": "blue",
              },
            },
            {
              range: {
                "obj1.count": {
                  gt: 5,
                },
              },
            },
          ],
        },
      },
      score_mode: "avg",
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
